Synonym: lateral nucleus of ventral medial geniculate nucleus
CytoDefiningCriteria: Dendritic fields of tufted neurons are arranged in parallel lamina in both cat and rat.  Brachial axons are oriented vertically
entering from the superior surface and coursing ventrally
Medial geniculate body lateral nucleus.Is part of: Ventral nucleus of medial geniculate body
DefiningCitation: D. K. (1964) The neuronal structure of the medial geniculate body of the cat.  J. Anat.
Medial geniculate body lateral nucleus.Definition: Anterior lateral part of the ventral division of the medial geniculate body described by Morest (1964) in the cat and also by Clerici and Coleman (1990)in the rat
